snippet.title: Incompatible Fusion Machine - [Full Playthrough]
snippet.description:
Incompatible Fusion Machine is an rpgmaker game made by Retinacyst for and is a sequel to Vanlen Poison Forest for the (You)RPGM Game Jam #8 - Spring Cleaning on itch.io.

SOMEBODY *cough* Amy *cough* stole an ANCIENT ARTIFACT and alerted the GODDAMN ALIENS to all of the magic locations on planet Earth. Now it's up to SOMEBODY *cough* Amy *cough* to fix it so that the ALIENS don't KIDNAP ALL MAGIC HUMANS AND EXPERIMENT ON THEM.

The Game: https://retinacyst.itch.io/incompatible-fusion-machine

Retinacyst's socials:
NeoCities: https://retinacyst.neocities.org
Twitter: https://twitter.com/retinacyst
Newgrounds: https://retinacyst.newgrounds.com
Tumblr: https://retinacyst.tumblr.com

Chapters:
00:00 The Game
26:48 Bonus
29:43 Alternative Calls
